attributes.action: Launch an immediate investigation into the near monopoly the Heart Media Group has on commercial radio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heart has nearly 30 commercial radio stations across the country, at least 3 times as many statiosn as what it had before it bought out G Cap Media in 2006. I urge the Prime Minister to look into this case of a blatant monopoly, and if necessary hand some stations to other companies.
